snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie F.,on June 6, 2016. Beloved wife of Steven. Devoted mother of Maya Hope and Eli James. Loving daughter of Allen and Marcia Fergang. Dear sister of Caryl Spector and Yale Fergang. Services today 1:30pm at Central Synagogue, Lexington Ave at 55th St. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEFSKY--Julie F.,on June 6, 2016. Beloved wife of Steven. Devoted mother of Maya Hope and Eli James. Loving daughter of Allen and Marcia Fergang. Dear sister of Caryl Spector and Yale Fergang. Services today 1:30pm at Central Synagogue, Lexington Ave at 55th St. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSEFSKY, JULIE F.
